topic.title: Getting container images
topic.para: To start a container, you need a container image. To get a container image, proceed as follows:

step.para: Navigate to the Podman containers page.
Click Get new image to open a search box for images.

para.para: Choose a preferred image registry or proceed with All registries

step.para: Define the Tag. The default value is latest
Fill in the image name or description in the Search for field to start the search.

procedure.para: Cockpit suggests possible images according to the entered name, registry and tag.

step.para: Select the desired image and click Download.
